content.question: The congressional system of standing committees is significant because it

choices.label: fosters the development of expertise by members
insulates decision-making from the influence of special interests
weakens Congress in its dealings with the President
prevents Congress from effectively processing its large legislative workload

content.answer: fosters the development of expertise by members

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress
